name: Froggy's Keys
description:
Your friend Froggy lost the keys to "the room" and accidentally locked his siblings in there.  You must find these keys and open the doors to thr room.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the first game i've ever worked on solo. I learned alot about myself while making this game and i plan to avoid making the same mistakes in my future projects.

 Future group projects will be made with unity, and my solo projects will be made with Game Maker Studio 2.

Im excited to finally rid myself of this game.

hope you enjoy :)
